title: Mount Fuji
description: Japan’s tallest peak and a sacred symbol of beauty and endurance.

title: Fushimi Inari Shrine
description: Famous for its thousands of red torii gates winding up the mountain.

title: Shibuya Crossing
description: One of the busiest pedestrian crossings in the world.

title: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
description: A mesmerizing bamboo forest perfect for peaceful strolls.

title: Nara Deer Park
description: Home to friendly free-roaming deer that bow for snacks.

title: Himeji Castle
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site and Japan’s most famous castle.

title: Odaiba Island
description: Futuristic shopping, entertainment, and seaside fun.

title: Nikko Toshogu Shrine
description: Lavishly decorated shrine complex surrounded by forest.

title: Dotonbori District
description: Lively streets full of neon, street food, and entertainment.

title: Hakone Onsen
description: A famous hot spring resort area with views of Mount Fuji.

title: Itsukushima Shrine
description: Known for its floating torii gate at high tide.

title: Akihabara
description: Mecca of electronics, anime culture, and gaming.

title: Ghibli Museum
description: A magical museum celebrating Studio Ghibli’s animation legacy.

title: Snow Monkeys of Jigokudani
description: See wild macaques bathing in natural hot springs during winter.

title: Takayama Old Town
description: A well-preserved Edo-period town with charming streets and shops.
